original_text:
**INSTITUTION
CRITICAL CARE MEDICINE
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN PROGRESS NOTE
PATIENT NAME :
**NAME[AAA , BBB]
ACCOUNT # :
**ID-NUM
**ROOM
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN :
**NAME[YYY M ZZZ]
ADMISSION DATE :
**DATE[Feb 29 2007]
EVALUATION DATE :
**DATE[Feb 30 07]
I personally managed Mr. **NAME[AAA] in the ICU .
He is a **AGE[in 60s]- year - old man with an intracranial bleed that may very well be tumor .
It is difficult to discern exactly the etiology .
The patient continues to be somewhat confused ; otherwise , he moves his extremities and follows simple commands .
He does not show any evidence of any lateralizing signs that I can see .
He passes air well on both sides of his chest .
Heart has a regular rhythm .
Abdomen is soft .
He puts out adequate amounts of urine .
His laboratory parameters are otherwise unremarkable .
He is for angiography today .
Critical care time 30 minutes .
___________________________________
**NAME[WWW M. XXX] , M.D.
